grahampaige.comment: And after considering all comments from this evening's meeting, I am pleased to announce that I too shall also vote affirmatively with respect to agenda item number three motion by Mr. Oberg seconded by Dr. Johnson recommending approval of proposed changes to Policy GBEA Staff Conflict of Interest at Page Two Section A adding verbiage requiring School Board employees who serve as vendors providing goods services not exceeding $5 thousand annually disclose such service provision within their annual disclosure statement effective immediately upon adoption Motion carried unanimously seven zero recorded digitally through roll call ordered by Vice Chair Mrs Graham Paige This concludes action items for tonight We now move into announcements and recognitions The first announcement comes from me It has come time once again when we honor those individuals celebrating work anniversaries during August September October November December January February March April May June July Our honorees include 25 year recipients Susan Brown Instructional Assistant Special Education Cluster One Building currently assigned to Stonewall Jackson High School employed since August 1997 Lisa Childress Administrative Office Support Specialist Transportation Department hired initially back in August 2000 Twenty-year recognition goes out to these instructional personnel including Michelle Edwards Math Teacher Mountain View High School originally appointed beginning August 2001 Jennifer Fauver Reading Specialist Quicksburg Elementary School started her career here starting August 2002 Fifteen-year awardee Rachel Hinegardner English Language Arts Instructor Central High School began teaching us officially in August 2006 Tenure fiveyear tenure award winners consist mainly but exclusively of teachers unless otherwise noted They're listed alphabetically Their names follow along with current assignments plus initial employment dates First up is Sarah Adams Science Educator North Fork Middle School joined Shenandoah County Public Schools staff dating back to August 2014 Next would be Ashley Baughman Title Three Literacy Coach Sandy Hook Elementary School She was brought aboard around August 2016 Then there's Emily Bogan Art Instructor W.W Robinson Elementary School Her start date happened about August 2016 Matthew Crawford Physical Ed Health Fitness Instructor Strasburg High School He came onboard exactly six years ago In addition Elizabeth DeHart Guidance Counselor Peter Muhlenberg Middle School Was added onto payroll circa August 2016 Thereafter Michaela Dinges Social Studies History Teacher Signal Knob Middle School Came over to SCPS just like others mentioned so far near August 2016 Also recognized were Christopher Dodson Music Director Woodstock Middle School His hire took place roughly six years prior Finally among tenured instructors receiving awards today rounds off our list Kait
